title: ellAm arinda mEdai
sahitya:
ellAm arinda mEdai nAn eduvum ariyAda pEdai nI


anupallavi

  kallAyirundAlum kaN maraivAnAlum sollAl viLangAda subrahmaNyanE


caraNam    nenjinilE ninaivaik-koDuppavan nIyE ninaittadai ellAm muDippavan nIyE
muDittadai ellAm vaLarppavan nIyE vaLarttadai ellAm vAzha vaippAyE
